https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/qs6gz6atyQcAvqC6qZaslOjliUG.jpg Lukas, a young farmer whose family is killed by savage raiders in the countryside, sets out on an epic quest for revenge, forming an unlikely trio with a majestic dragon and a swashbuckling, sword-fighting mercenary, Darius.
